other_tests.findings: Perforation of the right tympanic membrane, with bloody purulent material in the external ear canal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After the procedure, ear pain lessened, and hearing partially improved.

other_tests.findings: Cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) showed relatively few cells (mostly lymphocytes) and normal levels of protein and glucose.
Unchanged opacification in the right mastoid air cells and middle ear.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No extraaxial fluid collection, acute infarction, mass lesion or mass effect, or signal abnormality noted.

other_tests.findings: Showed unchanged opacification in right mastoid air cells and middle ear.
